mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, ID, GSEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, WDATE, LIKED FROM (SELECT SEQ, ID, GSEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, WDATE, LIKED FROM REVIEW ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <=5 ORDER BY WDATE DESC
SELECT SEQ, ID, GSEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, WDATE, LIKED FROM REVIEW WHERE GSEQ=#{gseq} ORDER BY WDATE DESC
SELECT AVG(LIKED) FROM REVIEW WHERE GSEQ LIKE #{gseq}
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content}, LIKED=#{liked} WHERE SEQ=#{seq}
